sentences.en: Her servants were similarly, if less ostentatiously attired.
sentences.cn: 她的仆人们穿着相似，只是没那么华丽耀眼。

sentences.en: Most of the men who now gathered around him again were similarly dressed.
sentences.cn: 现在重新聚在他周围的大多数人穿着差不多的衣服。

sentences.en: Same-sex marriages are not recognized. Similarly, marriages of close relatives are not legal.
sentences.cn: 同性婚姻得不到承认。同样，近亲结婚也不合法。
